inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Mace', 'CriticalChance', 5); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Morningstar', 'CriticalChance', 5); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Flail', 'CriticalChance', 5); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Expert Training, Maces
description: You gain an additional +5 chance to inflict critical hits with maces, morningstars, and flails.
